Expressions.Name: Neutral
Expressions.Desc: baseline.

Expressions.Name: Eye Direction - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Rotate the eyes so that the character is looking to their left.

Expressions.Name: Eye Direction - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Rotate the eyes so that the character is looking to their right.

Expressions.Name: Eye Direction - UP
Expressions.Desc: Rotate the eyes so that the character is looking up.

Expressions.Name: Eye Direction - DOWN
Expressions.Desc: Rotate the eyes so that the character is looking to down.

Expressions.Name: Eye Blink - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Blink the character's left eye.

Expressions.Name: Eye Blink - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Blink the character's right eye.

Expressions.Name: Eye Wide - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Open the character's left eye wide.

Expressions.Name: Eye Wide - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Open the character's right eye wide.

Expressions.Name: Eyebrow Up - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the character's left eyebrow in the 'up' position.

Expressions.Name: Eyebrow Up - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the character's right eyebrow in the 'up' position.

Expressions.Name: Eyebrow Down - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the character's left eyebrow in the 'down' position.

Expressions.Name: Eyebrow Down - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the character's right eyebrow in the 'down' position.

Expressions.Name: Eyebrow Up - CENTER
Expressions.Desc: Pose the character's mid eyebrows in the 'up' position.

Expressions.Name: Eyebrow Down - CENTER
Expressions.Desc: Pose the character's mid eyebrows in the 'up' position.

Expressions.Name: Jaw - OPEN
Expressions.Desc: Open the character's mouth/jaw as wide as it goes.

Expressions.Name: Jaw - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Rotate the character's jaw to the left side.

Expressions.Name: Jaw - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Rotate the character's jaw to the right side.

Expressions.Name: Upper Lip Up - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the upper lip's left side in the 'up' position.

Expressions.Name: Upper Lip Up - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the upper lip's right side in the 'up' position.

Expressions.Name: Lower Lip Down - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the lower lip's left side in the 'down' position.

Expressions.Name: Lower Lip Down - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the lower lip's right side in the 'down' position.

Expressions.Name: Mouth Stretch - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's stretched on the 'left' side.

Expressions.Name: Mouth Stretch - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's stretched on the 'right' side.

Expressions.Name: Mouth Narrow - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's narrowed on the 'left' side.

Expressions.Name: Mouth Narrow - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's narrowed on the 'right' side.

Expressions.Name: Smile - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's in a smile on the 'left' side.

Expressions.Name: Smile - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's in a smile on the 'right' side.

Expressions.Name: Frown - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's in a frown on the 'left' side.

Expressions.Name: Frown - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's in a frown on the 'right' side.

Expressions.Name: Mouth Scrunch - LEFT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's scrunched on the 'left' side.

Expressions.Name: Mouth Scrunch - RIGHT
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth so it's scrunched on the 'right' side.

Expressions.Name: Phoneme - OO
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth in an 'OO' phoneme shape.

Expressions.Name: Phoneme - CH
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth in an 'CH' phoneme shape.

Expressions.Name: Phoneme - MBP
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth in an 'MBP' phoneme shape (pressed).

Expressions.Name: Phoneme - FV
Expressions.Desc: Pose the mouth in an 'FV' phoneme shape.

Expressions.Name: Mouth Up
Expressions.Desc: Move the character's entire mouth 'up'.

Expressions.Name: Mouth Down
Expressions.Desc: Move the character's entire mouth 'down'.

Expressions.Name: Head Down
Expressions.Desc: Rotate the character's head 'down'.

Expressions.Name: Head Up
Expressions.Desc: Rotate the character's head 'up'.

Expressions.Name: Head Left
Expressions.Desc: Turn the character's head 'left'.

Expressions.Name: Head Right
Expressions.Desc: Turn the character's head 'right'.

Expressions.Name: Head Tilt Right
Expressions.Desc: Tilt the character's head 'right'.

Expressions.Name: Head Tilt Left
Expressions.Desc: Tilt the character's head 'left'.
